title: Lazure's set
info: Lazure's set is a vanity developer item set that can be obtained rarely (5% chance) from Treasure Bags in Expert Mode. It is the vanity set made for Lazure, an artist who develops graphics for Terraria.
stat:
Type
VanitySet
Tooltip'Great for impersonating devs!'
